Current
   Environment

Introduce:
 The Environment is the place of human existence and activities and the supply base of natural resources for human production and consumption. At present, human beings are faced with increasingly serious environmental problems because no country or region can avoid the continuous environmental pollution and the destruction of natural resources, which directly threatens the ecological environment, the health of human beings and the survival of generations. On this website, we will talk about some funny knowledge about protecting our environment.

Reference:
 https://baike.baidu.com/

    At school At home
Actions that help protect the
Environment
Wherever you are

limit climate change: (5 actions)

  • Reduce, reuse and recycle

    • Waste pollutes our land, waterways and Marine environment. It also contributes to greenhouse gas emissions.

    1.Reduce plastic use and avoid single-use plastics.
    2.Use reusable items such as drink bottles and straws.
    3.Follow your local council's recycling rules to recycle correctly.
    4.Buy second-hand.

  • Plant trees

    • As trees grow, they help prevent climate change by removing carbon dioxide from the air and releasing oxygen into the atmosphere.

    1.Plant trees on your property.
    2.Participate in community planting programs.
    3.Donate to tree planting projects.

  • Reduce electricity use

    • When we use electricity and natural gas, we produce greenhouse gas emissions.

    1.Use LED bulbs.
    2.Turn off the lights when not in use.
    3.Unplug unused electronics from wall sockets.

  • Reduce emissions from transportation

    • Transportation emissions affect air quality and contribute to climate change.

    Walk, bike, or take public transportation whenever possible.

  • Buy local ingredients reduce transportation

    • Using local ingredients helps reduce greenhouse gas emissions from transportation.

    1.Buy local and in-season food.
    2.Shop at the local market.

    Prevent land pollution: (3 actions)

  • Reduce outdoor burning

    • Outdoor burning garbage causes air pollution.

    1.Don’t burn waste in the backyard, especially plastic.
    2.Report smoke and pollution from the fire to the local council.
    3.Ask the local council for permission before starting an outdoor fire.

  • Take care of a local stream

    • Waste and sediment pollution from streams or rivers can be washed into the ocean.

    1.Pick up litter near the creek so it doesn't run into the sea.
    2.Plant trees near streams. This helps hold the stream and bed together and prevents the soil from being washed away.

  • Plant trees

    • As trees grow, they help prevent climate change by removing carbon dioxide from the air and releasing oxygen into the atmosphere.

    1.Plant trees on your property.
    2.Participate in community planting programs.
    3.Donate to tree planting projects.
